participant_1.background:
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
I am not concerned about my appearance in the morning because I have more important things to focus on.
i like all types of music.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

participant_2.background:
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.
i love the smell of beans.
My ideal lunch companion would be someone who loves coffee as much as I do, so we could enjoy a cup together and chat about our day.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well! Just got back from London and I'm relaxing at home.
Oh, nice! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I did. I love London and I'm glad to be back in the US, but I'm also sad to leave.
I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about London?
I love the people. They're so friendly and welcoming. And I love the food. It's amazing.
That's great to hear. I've never been to London, but it's always been on my list of places to visit.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing city.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to play the piano. I've been playing for a few years now and I love it.
That's so cool! I love the piano. It's such a beautiful instrument.
Thanks! I agree. It's my favorite instrument to play.
Do you play any other instruments?
No, just the piano.
Oh, that's too bad. I wish I could play more instruments.
Me too! But I'm happy with the piano.
You should be! It's a great instrument.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to bake. I love spending time in the kitchen and creating delicious treats.
That's so cool! I love baking too. I'm not very good at it, but I still enjoy it.
Baking is a lot of fun. And it's so rewarding when you create something delicious.
I agree! It's so satisfying to see your hard work pay off in a delicious dessert.
Me too! I love baking for my family and friends. It's always a hit.
I bet! Baking is a great way to show your love for others.
It is! And it's so much fun.
I'm glad you enjoy baking. It's a great hobby.
Thanks! I love it.
